ee1cb8986c0c.description: We write down our mess, that we may marvel in what is same about us, wonder about what is different & embrace one another anyway without condition.

paragraphs.text: Love it..you should get urself a publisher am serious coz this is what you were born to do ur a natural!
I have been away for a bit, and I only just noticed—and I am honoured or, as others might say, honored—I get a special mention in your bio ❤ ❤ ❤ And yes, I am happy, Poet.

6e285b4a1878.name: emerald jane waters👗
6e285b4a1878.bio: Being light while trying to hold onto my wild mind--with two kinds of teenager and a soulful little dog. Flower painter. Cultural anthropologist. Portland.

21244d98316c.name: TeriJo
21244d98316c.bio: Artist, Mother, Kissy Face, Poet, Survivor. A little broken, but, working on repairs. Bite me. Try it. I double dog dare ya..!!

4033033ae1ef.name: Samantha
4033033ae1ef.bio: Daydreamer and Legal Analyst from Vancouver, BC. A hopeless romantic, music lover, amateur writer and poet wannabe. Practice makes perfect. Well, maybe 💁

51b5b5ba1fb.name: Tamyka Bell
51b5b5ba1fb.bio: writes. runs. drinks coffee. doesn’t go in for that whole sleep thing

169222e5796b.name: Heath Houston
169222e5796b.bio: Fractured Poet — I’m just another broken toy. My heart is messy, nearly dead… I don’t care. These are my pieces of the edge… www.instagram.com/heathhouston

264440f3df1b.name: Jackie Ann
264440f3df1b.bio: Passionate writer who enjoys using the creative process as a means of self expression, self reflection, and occasionally self mockery.

a68e64701e2c.name: Salome Qenya
a68e64701e2c.bio: I'm not a writer I love reading...A Christian who has fallen more than I remember everyday struggling to get it right and letting Jesus reign in my heart.
